.. image:: ../lib/logo.svg
   :width: 100px

**************
AI Diff Commit
**************

Automates the creation of standardized Git commit messages using `OpenAI's API <https://platform.openai.com/docs/>`_, ensuring adherence to the `Conventional Commits specification <https://www.conventionalcommits.org/en/v1.0.0/>`_ for clear and meaningful commit history.

.. image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/python-3670A0?style=for-the-badge&logo=python&logoColor=ffdd54
   :alt: Python
.. image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/OpenAI-00A79D?style=for-the-badge&logo=openai&logoColor=white
   :alt: OpenAI
.. image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/Git-F05032?style=for-the-badge&logo=git&logoColor=white
   :alt: Git
.. image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/Conventional%20Commits-FB607C?style=for-the-badge&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,
   :alt: Conventional Commits
